description: The true "end" game of transport is transport through the End. (ha.)
The End holds infinite resources and power through the form of XP and overpowered items allowing flight and transport through other dimensions - but what about transport through the End itself?
Once you make the journey to the outer islands to start your exploration, what happens when you want to find your way back to a place you've been before? Or quickly get to your Enderman farm?
Craft it with /d/4 Obsidian, 4 Chorus Fruit, and a Lodestone compass that's been set to a Lodestone./d/
Once you've done so, fuel the End Anchor with an End Crystal.
Right-clicking the End Anchor will then teleport you directly to the connected Lodestone.
/4/DO NOT TRY THIS IN OTHER DIMENSIONS/4/. The Dragon's fury reaches across worlds, even in death.
With this newfound power, go, and free the End - explore to your heart's content. And ensure that you always have a route home or back to where you were; via a network of Anchors.
